nde2.pull.methodcalls.delivery

Class GetTables

  • java.lang.Object
    • nde2.pull.methodcalls.BaseMethodCall
      • nde2.pull.methodcalls.delivery.DeliveryMethodCall
        • nde2.pull.methodcalls.delivery.GetTables
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GetChildAreaTables

    public class GetTables
extends DeliveryMethodCall
    Fetches the dataset tables from ONS.

    Generally, you'll need to set dataset families and areas to get the data for, and optionally a date range.

    Author:
    filip
